title: Game Music Mega Pack
description: "Game Music Mega Pack" contains 70+ Melodic tracks, 6.2 hours of high-quality audio content, 15 music categories, 276 audio assets, all in one pack!
longDescription:
NEW Discounted price! Get it now!


As a major thank you to the response and feedback for this pack, "Tiny Worlds" is a NEW FREE EXPANSION PACK for the owners of GMMP!


"Tiny Worlds" Features:

28 Level Themes (1-2min each)

Bonus Content:

9 Level Overlays (Special Stingers for level number intros)

7 Overworld Themes (transition compatible)

71 Misc Stinger/Sound Effects


Base Pack Preview: https://soundcloud.com/wertandrew2/game-music-mega-pack-demo-preview


After a year in the making, "Game Music Mega Pack" is finally released, containing 70+ high-quality modular music tracks. GMMP offers a variety of different settings and moods from around the world. All content is ready to play and organized in categories based on the mood of the track.


Features:

• 76 original instrumental music tracks

• Approximately 6.2 hours of audio.

• Modular, rhythmic and controllable tracks.

• Longer tracks with music progression; majority of full tracks are 2+ minutes long.

• Includes Pirate, Jungle, Persian, Sci-fi, Epic, Super-Hero, Fantasy, Arcade, Horror, Sneaking, Modern, Noir and Cartoon themes (categories are not named after these themes).

• Middle 8's or alternative melodies are given separately as short loops so you can mix-and-match settings (total of 139 special audio track versions)


Bonus Content:

Buying "Game Music Mega Pack", you also get:

• 54 various stingers, including but not limited to, achievement sounds, tonal fxs, and jump-scares.

• 7 extra music tracks.

• 5 Menu Sfx (Found inside Stingers / Other)
